name: StoicWisdom
0:
”Alexa, ask Stoic Wisdom for a quote.”
”Alexa, ask Stoic Wisdom for a Seneca quote.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stoic wisdom
des: Delivers quotes from the great Stoics. You can just ask for a quote, or ask for a quote from Seneca, Marcus Aurelius, or Epictetus. You may also try an experimental feature to ask about a subject - try "Alexa, ask Stoic Wisdom for a quote about happiness" or "Alexa, ask Stoic Wisdom what Seneca has to say about happiness"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
